channel.title: looking for a kaiju item
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "looking for a kaiju item" - I have a mantis rune and 1 storybook page

item.title: looking for a kaiju item
item.content:encoded:
these are the kaiju items im looking for

Bear Coat
Book of Spoilers
Carapace Armor
Claw Card
Fruits Basket
Go Piece
Kaiju Memento
Late-Night Snack
Magical Wand
Monkey Cymbals
Perfect Hair
Persocom
Pokerballs
Red Water
Shiny Belt
Soul of Steel
Spirit of the Demon of the Sand
Tire Tracks
